Set of messages 1.Message:
Make Housework Fun
•	Household chores aren’t fun… or are they? You can make them into a game, like this. 
•	There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!
•	There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!
•	Pick up the red shirt, it’s fun, fun, fun!
•	There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!
•	There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!
•	Put the red shirt into the hamper, it’s fun, fun, fun!
•	There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!
•	There’s a fire on the mountain! Run, run, run!
•	Put the shoes in the shoe rack, it's fun, fun, fun!
